messages.subject: Samurai Fiction 2008 Extension
messages.msgSnippet: In order to get maximum participation, the deadline for submissions has been extended to August 31st, 2008.  As an added bonus, if we can get 10 entries, I ll
messages.messageBody:
In order to get maximum participation, the deadline for submissions
has been extended to August 31st, 2008. As an added bonus, if we can
get 10 entries, I'll donate $100 from my own pocket to go to the
prizewinner. Tell your friends!

So, to reiterate, deadline for the contest has been changed now to
8/31/08. If anyone who has already submitted their stories want/need
to edit them, feel free, you now have an extra 6 weeks.

Thanks
